languages.text: "Быть может... трехокие мон-кай, что зрят Ша'эиль, могли бы пригодиться труппе. Они не боятся владений Той, Что Жаждет, бороздя их на крыльях своих сталекрылых птиц. И даже сумели отыскать путь к Первому Миру, который был сокрыт от нашего взора". {n}Арлекин задумчиво склоняет голову.{/n} "Твои слова ладны, мон-кай. Но что ответят на это твои спутники?"

traits.locale_text: "Быть может... трехокие мон-кай, что зрят Ша'эиль, могли бы пригодиться труппе. Они не боятся владений Той, Что Жаждет, бороздя их на крыльях своих стелекрылых птиц. И даже сумели отыскать путь к Первому Миру, который был скорыт от нашего взора". {n}Арлекин задумчиво склоняет голову.{/n} "Твои слова ладны, мон-кай. Но что ответят на это твои спутники?"
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Perhaps... the three-eyed mon-keigh who see into Sha'eil could be of use to the Troupe. They do not fear the realm of She Who Thirsts — they cut through it on their steel-winged birds. They even found their way to a Crone World that was hidden from our sight." {n}The Harlequin lowers his head in thought.{/n} "Your words are harmonious, mon-keigh. But what will your companions say?"
languages.original_text: "Быть может... трехокие мон-кай, что зрят Ша'эиль, могли бы пригодиться труппе. Они не боятся владений Той, Что Жаждет, бороздя их на крыльях своих сталекрылых птиц. И даже сумели отыскать путь к Первому Миру, который был сокрыт от нашего взора". {n}Арлекин задумчиво склоняет голову.{/n} "Твои слова ладны, мон-кай. Но что ответят на это твои спутники?"

traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: 「そうだね…シャーエイルをのぞく三つ目のモン＝ケイはトルゥプの役に立つだろう。奴らはかの渇きたる女を恐れない…鉄の翼を持つ鳥で通過するんだ。僕らの目には隠されてた老朽惑星への行き方さえ見つけた」{n}ハーレクィンは頭を低くして思案する。{/n}「君の言葉は調和が取れてるね、モン＝ケイ。でも、お仲間はなんて言うかな？」
languages.original_text: "Perhaps... the three-eyed mon-keigh who see into Sha'eil could be of use to the Troupe. They do not fear the realm of She Who Thirsts — they cut through it on their steel-winged birds. They even found their way to a Crone World that was hidden from our sight." {n}The Harlequin lowers his head in thought.{/n} "Your words are harmonious, mon-keigh. But what will your companions say?"

traits.locale_text: 「そうだね…シャーエイルをのぞく三つ目のモン＝ケイはトルゥプの役に立つだろう。奴らはかの渇きたる女を恐れない…鉄の翼を持つ鳥で通過するんだ。僕らの目には隠されてた老朽惑星への行き方さえ見つけた」{n}ハーレクィンは頭を低くして思案する。{/n}「君の言葉は調和が取れてるね、モン＝ケイ。でも、お仲間はなんて言うかな？」
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: “或许吧……或许那些能看到纱芮尔的三眼猴子可以协助剧团。他们并不惧怕饥渴女士的领域，他们乘着钢铁巨鸟穿过她的领域，甚至还找到了通往老妪世界的道路。这个世界就连我们都未能找到。”{n}丑角低下头，深思着。{/n}“你的话充满了和谐之意，猴子，但你那些同伴是怎么想的呢？”
languages.original_text: "Perhaps... the three-eyed mon-keigh who see into Sha'eil could be of use to the Troupe. They do not fear the realm of She Who Thirsts — they cut through it on their steel-winged birds. They even found their way to a Crone World that was hidden from our sight." {n}The Harlequin lowers his head in thought.{/n} "Your words are harmonious, mon-keigh. But what will your companions say?"

traits.locale_text: “或许吧……或许那些能看到纱芮尔的三眼猴子可以协助剧团。他们并不惧怕饥渴女士的领域，他们乘着钢铁巨鸟穿过她的领域，甚至还找到了通往老妪世界的道路。这个世界就连我们都未能找到。”{n}丑角低下头，深思着。{/n}“你的话充满了和谐之意，猴子，但你那些同伴是怎么想的呢？”
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: « Peut-être... que les mon-keigh à trois yeux qui peuvent voir dans le Sha'eil pourraient être utiles à la Troupe. Ils ne craignent pas l'Assoiffée et traversent son royaume avec leurs oiseaux à ailes d'acier. Ils ont même trouvé un monde déchu dont nous avions perdu la trace. » {n}L'Arlequin baisse la tête, plongé dans ses pensées.{/n} « Vos paroles sont harmonieuses, mon-keigh. Mais qu'en pensent vos compagnons ? »
languages.original_text: "Perhaps... the three-eyed mon-keigh who see into Sha'eil could be of use to the Troupe. They do not fear the realm of She Who Thirsts — they cut through it on their steel-winged birds. They even found their way to a Crone World that was hidden from our sight." {n}The Harlequin lowers his head in thought.{/n} "Your words are harmonious, mon-keigh. But what will your companions say?"

traits.locale_text: « Peut-être... que les mon-keigh à trois yeux qui peuvent voir dans le Sha'eil pourraient être utiles à la Troupe. Ils ne craignent pas l'Assoiffée et traversent son royaume avec leurs oiseaux à ailes d'acier. Ils ont même trouvé un monde déchu dont nous avions perdu la trace. » {n}L'arlequin baisse la tête, plongé dans ses pensées.{/n} « Vos paroles sont harmonieuses, mon-keigh. Mais qu'en pensent vos compagnons ? »
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: «Tal vez... los mon-keigh de tres ojos que ven el Sha'eil puedan ser útiles para la compañía. No temen al reino de la Sedienta, sino que lo atraviesan con sus pájaros de acero. Han encontrado incluso el camino a un mundo ancestral oculto a nuestra mirada». {n}El Arlequín agacha la cabeza, pensativo.{/n} «Tus palabras rebosan armonía, mon-keigh, pero ¿cuál será la opinión de tus compañeros?».
languages.original_text: "Perhaps... the three-eyed mon-keigh who see into Sha'eil could be of use to the Troupe. They do not fear the realm of She Who Thirsts — they cut through it on their steel-winged birds. They even found their way to a Crone World that was hidden from our sight." {n}The Harlequin lowers his head in thought.{/n} "Your words are harmonious, mon-keigh. But what will your companions say?"

traits.locale_text: «Tal vez... los mon-keigh de tres ojos que ven el Sha'eil puedan ser útiles para la compañía. No temen al reino de la Sedienta, sino que lo atraviesan con sus pájaros de acero. Han encontrado incluso el camino a un mundo ancestral oculto a nuestra mirada». {n}El Arlequín agacha la cabeza, pensativo.{/n} «Tus palabras rebosan armonía, mon-keigh, pero ¿cuál será la opinión de tus compañeros?».
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Vielleicht ... können die dreiäugigen Chem-Pan-Sey, die nach Sha'eil sehen können, für das Ensemble von Nutzen sein. Sie fürchten das Reich von Ihr, die dürstet, nicht. Sie durchschneiden es auf ihren Vögeln mit Schwingen aus Stahl. Sie haben sogar ihren Weg auf eine Hexenwelt gefunden, die vor unseren Augen verborgen war." {n}Der Harlekin senkt nachdenklich den Kopf.{/n} "Eure Worte sind harmonisch, Chem-Pan-Sey. Aber was werden Eure Gefährten sagen?"
languages.original_text: "Perhaps... the three-eyed mon-keigh who see into Sha'eil could be of use to the Troupe. They do not fear the realm of She Who Thirsts — they cut through it on their steel-winged birds. They even found their way to a Crone World that was hidden from our sight." {n}The Harlequin lowers his head in thought.{/n} "Your words are harmonious, mon-keigh. But what will your companions say?"

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht ... können die dreiäugigen Chem-Pan-Sey, die nach Sha'eil sehen können, für das Ensemble von Nutzen sein. Sie fürchten das Reich von Ihr, die dürstet, nicht. Sie durchschneiden es auf ihren Vögeln mit Schwingen aus Stahl. Sie haben sogar ihren Weg auf eine Hexenwelt gefunden, die vor unseren Augen verborgen war." {n}Der Harlekin senkt nachdenklich den Kopf.{/n} "Eure Worte sind harmonisch, Chem-Pan-Sey. Aber was werden Eure Gefährten sagen?"
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader

languages.text: "Mümkündür. Sha'eil'i görebilen üç gözlü mon-keighlerin Kumpanyama yararı dokunabilir. Susayan'ın diyarından korkmuyorlar. Çelik kanatlı kuşlarıyla o diyardan geçip gidiyorlar. Hatta bizim gözümüzden saklanan bir Acuze Dünya'nın yolunu bile bulmuşlar." {n}Arleken, düşüncelere dalarak başını eğiyor.{/n} "Sözlerin kulağa ahenkli geliyor mon-keigh. Peki ya yoldaşların buna ne diyor?"
languages.original_text: "Perhaps... the three-eyed mon-keigh who see into Sha'eil could be of use to the Troupe. They do not fear the realm of She Who Thirsts — they cut through it on their steel-winged birds. They even found their way to a Crone World that was hidden from our sight." {n}The Harlequin lowers his head in thought.{/n} "Your words are harmonious, mon-keigh. But what will your companions say?"

traits.locale_text: "Mümkündür... Sha'eil'i görebilen üç gözlü mon-keighler, Kumpanyamın işine gelebilir. Susayan'ın diyarından korkuları yok... Çelik kanatlı kuşlarıyla o diyardan geçip gidiyorlar. Hatta bizim gözümüzden saklanan bir Acuze Dünya'nın yolunu bile bulmuşlar." {n}Arleken, düşüncelere dalarak başını eğiyor.{/n} "Sözlerin, kulağa ahenkli geliyor mon-keigh. Peki yoldaşların buna ne diyor?"
traits.speaker: CrownWorldHarlequinLeader
